welcome_message_body: Welcome to Maldon, a charming town known for its rich history and beautiful countryside. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this lovely place has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wethersfield Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all international and domestic flights, with a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities available for passengers.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is connected to the main terminal via a shuttle train and primarily serves low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the 'STN Airport WiFi' network and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
